title: 1971 Ballon d'Or
text:
The 1971 Ballon d'Or, given to the best <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player in Europe as judged by a panel of sports journalists from <a href="UEFA">UEFA</a> member countries, was awarded to <a href="Johan%20Cruijff">Johan Cruyff</a> on 28 December 1971.
Cruyff was the first <a href="Netherlands">Dutch</a> national to win the award, and also the first <a href="AFC%20Ajax">Ajax</a> player to win the trophy.
